== Kenyan LoCo Irc Meeting ==
This page is dedicated to Kenyan LoCo team's (ubuntu-ke) Irc meetings. Meetings are held every two weeks on Sunday at 3pm (GMT+3). The meetings are open to all. Please feel free to drop in at #ubuntu-ke (on irc.freenode.net).

==== Next Meeting ====
The next ubuntu-ke Irc meeting is Sun 16th June 11:30 GMT (14.30 Kenyan Time).

==== Probable Attendees ====
Please feel free to add or your name (and/or nick) here if you wish to confirm your attendance.
* Ronald Odero (otis)
* David Scannell (davehat)
* Onesmus Maroko (roxxy)
* Miano Njoka (zsh)

==== Topics To Be Discussed ====
You can add any topic that you think will be of importance during the meeting.
* Ubuntu CD distribution
* Ubuntu Swahili translation
* Strategise on getting to the official teamlist
* AOB
